entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Convert to GeneratedComInterface fixall will put StringMarshalling on all interfaces if the first interface needs it #94376
  • IServiceProvider.GetServices return value nullability #94374

Closed

  • Why would the continuation be null at this stage? Where did this code come from? #94375
  • Not so sure about this. #94373
  • Conditional in HttpConnection.cs seems redundant? #94261
    Future
  • CoreCLR replaces methods in BitConverter with a exteremely slower version #94001
  • Redundant conditional in OleDbDataReader.ProcessResults? #94262
  • PauseWriterThreshold and ResumeWriterThreshold options of PipeOptions not validated properly #75166
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #94372
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Provide Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents package readme #94371
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • `JsonSerializerOptions.Web` for `JsonSerializerOptions` #94370
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • update IServiceProvider.GetServices return value nullability #94369
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix redundant conditional in HttpConnection #94278
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix reundant conditional in OleDbDataReader.ProcessResults #94360
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • reduce handle table lock contention #94159
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution

Updated

  • [mono] Trying to fix performance regression. #94358
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • More general VN const casting #94359
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove [EditorBrowsable(Never)] from [InlineArray], add XML docs #94343
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.x
  • Convert DIV/MOD to UDIV/UMOD using assertions #94347
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • feat: add new IMemoryCache extensions #94335
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Fix fgOptimizeAddition opt for AOT #94350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow RyuJIT to refer to frozen RuntimeType instances #94342
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Emit exception blocks for the new ILGenerator #94366
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Unblock building with UseLocalAppHostPack #94340
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
